column4: hi just one question about wifi usb card is possible it will work in master mode (like Aces Point / AP) under ubuntu/linux while manufacturer says it works under windows in software AP mode .. no exactly sure what it means but just if someone has any idea
http://linuxwireless.org/en/users/Drivers if you can figure out your manufacturer or chipset then this list will tell you the current capabilities of your device in linux
well emm it is Ralink Technology, Corp. RT2870/RT3070 Wireless Adapter and all i can find is rt2800usb but in colum is only interrogation mark so still have no idea
